## Mutation Strategy {#mutation}
### Possible Planting Formations {#planting}

The Payapa berry can be acquired by surrounding a plot with a [[Berries/Wiki]] berry, a [[Berries/Cornn]] berry, a [[Berries/Bluk]] berry, and a [[Berries/Pamtre]] berry.

**Important**: Pamtre will mutate into [[Berries/Kebia]] with the [[File:Rocky_Helmet.png\|32px]][[Oak Items/Rocky Helmet]] equipped, and Cornn will mutate into [[Berries/Charti]] with the [[File:Cell_Battery.png\|32px]][[Oak Items/Cell Battery]] equipped.  Make sure neither are in use while attempting this mutation.

**Base Formation**
::: table-mutations
| :----: | :----: | :----: |
|[[File:Wiki.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Wiki]] |{.mutation} | [[File:Cornn.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Cornn]] | |
| [[File:Bluk.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Bluk]] | {.mutation} | [[File:Pamtre.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Pamtre]] | |
:::

**Optimized Formation**
:::collapsed Payapa Mutation - Farm Simulator Code
Copy & paste the line below into the [[Farm Simulator]]'s Import from Text.


:::
The Wiki and Bulk berries are likely to die off before getting a Payapa mutation ( approx. 28% chance of success in the first 11 minutes), so [[File:Freeze_Mulch.png\|32px]][[Items/Freeze Mulch]] is reocommended to make them live until the mutation happens.  This setup can also spawn additional Pamtre Berries, which should be removed with a [[File:Berry_Shovel.png\|32px]][[Items/Berry Shovel]].
::: table-mutations
| :----: | :----: | :----: | :----: | :----: |
|[[File:Wiki.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Wiki]]{.freeze} |{.mutation} | [[File:Cornn.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Cornn]] | {.mutation} | [[File:Wiki.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Wiki]]{.freeze} | |
| [[File:Bluk.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Bluk]]{.freeze} | {.mutation} | [[File:Pamtre.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Pamtre]] | {.mutation}| [[File:Bluk.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Bluk]]{.freeze} | |
|  | {.mutation}| | {.mutation} |  | |
| [[File:Cornn.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Cornn]] | {.mutation} | [[File:Wiki.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Wiki]]{.freeze} | {.mutation} | [[File:Cornn.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Cornn]] | |
| [[File:Pamtre.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Pamtre]] | {.mutation} | [[File:Bluk.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Bluk]]{.freeze} | {.mutation} | [[File:Pamtre.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Pamtre]] | |
:::

**Timing Table**
All planting times use the time-to-ripe remaining of the first planted berry for subsequent planting times.
|Berry |	Planting Time with No Modifier |	Planting Time with Mulch or Sprayduck | Planting Time with Mulch & Sprayduck |
|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|
|[[File:Pamtre.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Pamtre]] | `Planted First` | | |
|[[File:Cornn.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Cornn]] |	02:30:00 |	01:40:00 | 01:06:07|
|[[File:Wiki.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Wiki]] |	00:06:00 |	00:04:00 |	00:02:40 |
|[[File:Bluk.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Bluk]] |	00:05:30 |	00:03:40 |	00:02:26 |

#### Mutations
Payapa Berries can be used to mutate the following Berries.

| Used In                                       | Other Requirements |
| :---:                                         | :---: |
| [[File:Colbur.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Colbur]] | [[File:Rabuta.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Rabuta]] [[File:Kasib.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Kasib]] |
| [[File:Petaya.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Petaya]]  | [[File:Occa.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Occa]] [[File:Passho.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Passho]] [[File:Wacan.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Wacan]] [[File:Rindo.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Rindo]] [[File:Yache.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Yache]] [[File:Chople.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Chople]] [[File:Kebia.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Kebia]] [[File:Shuca.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Shuca]] [[File:Coba.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Coba]] [[File:Tanga.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Tanga]] [[File:Charti.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Charti]] [[File:Kasib.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Kasib]] [[File:Haban.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Haban]] [[File:Colbur.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Colbur]] [[File:Babiri.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Babiri]] [[File:Chilan.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Chilan]] [[File:Roseli.png\|32px]] [[Berries/Roseli]] |
